name: FRIDA
description:
FRIDA, a text-RPG Game

This is a console, text-based rpg game, so you dont need any apps to run it really, except for windows.

Features:
-Dungeons, with random procedural rooms
-3 Areas to explore
-Lots of random procedural enemies
-Lots of random procedural gear
-Debuffs
-Basic storyline
-A Basic Boss Battle
-Items, potions.

Welcome to FRIDA, my first text-based RPG project. This was made for fun while I was still in college, while studying Game Design
If you have any suggestions or glitches, feel free to contact me
As of now this is open source, just contact me for the source :)
Enjoy!
